title: National debt owed to holders of govt securities

content.question: The United States national debt is

choices.label: the amount of money owed by the federal government to United States citizens
the amount of money owed by the federal government to other United States government agencies
the amount of currency in the hands of foreigners
the amount of money owed by state and local governments to United States citizens
the amount of money owed to holders of United States government securities

content.answer: the amount of money owed to holders of United States government securities

topic.text: 5.4: Government Deficits and the National Debt

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe economic concepts, principles, or models.
